MessageHistory.Text: We've been working together for a while now, and you've proven to be quite reliable.
If you're needing to order larger quantities of supplies, you can now organize an in-person meeting with me. Just send me a text.
I've received $360 cash from you. Your debt is now paid off.
Agreed. I'll be in the west construction site for the next 6 hours.
Hey, that drop is ready on the north exterior wall of the arcade

I need a dead drop:
4x Granddaddy Purple Seed
3x Sour Diesel Seed
3x Green Crack Seed
Working on it. Should be ready in around 5 hours
I've received $405 cash from you. Your debt is now paid off.
Your drop is ready. Grab it behind Thompson Construction
Agreed. I'll be next to the mayor's house for the next 6 hours.
